definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: It was still imposed by an indiction; only an indiction was declared every year.
sentences.chinese: 數額依然由訓令規定，只是變成了一年一度的訓令。

sentences.english: It was still imposed by an indiction; only an indiction was declared every year.
sentences.chinese: 數額依然由訓令規定，只是變成了一年一度的訓令。

sentences.english: Osric and Polonius, especially, seem to respect this injunction.
sentences.chinese: 其中奧斯里克與波格涅斯尤其尊重這一訓令。

sentences.english: The directive in life, the moral imperative was so uncomplicated.
sentences.chinese: 生命中的訓令，必要的道德是如此簡易。

sentences.english: The pope issued a bull declaring that abortion was not approved by the church.
sentences.chinese: 教皇發佈訓令，宣佈墮胎不被教堂認可。

definition: Fabi, first currency issued by the 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] in 1935, in use until 1948
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
